item.title: backoff and retry in go
item.description: Failure is a way of life. Requests(http or others..) can fail for many reasons. Decision to stop or retry can be very critical for applications. backoff algorithms provide a way to backoff and retry on a failure. There are two popular methods to backoff, constant backoff and exponential backoff. I use backoff library, which is a Go port of exponential backoff algorithm from Google’s HTTP Client Library for Java.
